title: The Aussie Greeting
description: Say 'G'day mate!' to the next 3 people you meet today

title: Vegemite Challenge
description: Eat a spoonful of Vegemite and post your reaction

title: Thong Throw
description: Play a game of thong (flip-flop) throwing with your mates

title: Fair Dinkum
description: Speak in Australian slang for the next hour

title: BBQ Master
description: Cook something on the barbie and share it with a neighbor

title: Wake-Up Call
description: Call or message me at a set time tomorrow to make sure I wake up on time.

title: Surprise Snack
description: Buy me a snack that you think I’ll love.

title: The DJ
description: You must let me control the music for the next hour, no complaints.

title: Power Hour
description: You have one hour to complete any task I give you.

title: Social Sabotage
description: Post a funny (but not too embarrassing) status or story on your social media.

title: Coffee Run
description: Bring me my favorite coffee or tea.

title: Cheers to That
description: Take a shot or drink of my choice with me right now.

title: Clean Freak
description: Tidy up a room or space I choose.

title: The Chauffeur
description: Drive me somewhere, no matter how inconvenient.

title: Mystery Gift
description: Buy me a small surprise gift.

title: Shoutout
description: Compliment me publicly in person or on social media.

title: Flashback
description: Share a funny or embarrassing memory about us.

title: Freestyle
description: Perform a 30-second rap or poem about me.

title: Swap It
description: Trade one of your cards with one of mine.

title: Sing It
description: Perform a song of my choice (or at least the chorus) out loud.

title: Truth Bomb
description: Answer one personal question honestly.

title: Dare Me
description: I get to dare you to do something within reason.

title: Fast Food Run
description: Go get food from a drive-thru of my choice.

title: Gamer Mode
description: Play a video or board game of my choice with me.

title: The Joker
description: Tell me your best joke. If I don’t laugh, you owe me a favor.

title: The Decision Maker
description: You have to make a tough decision for me.

title: Good Vibes Only
description: You have to hype me up and say five great things about me.

title: Photo Op
description: Take a fun or ridiculous picture with me right now.

title: Blindfold Challenge
description: Try to complete a simple task blindfolded.

title: Instant Party
description: You must play music and dance for at least 30 seconds.

title: Movie Night
description: Watch a movie of my choice with me.

title: Mystery Task
description: I get to make up a brand-new challenge for you.

title: Secret Keeper
description: Tell me something you’ve never told me before.

title: Random Act of Kindness
description: Do something nice for a stranger.

title: Insta Poll
description: Let me create and post a poll on your social media.

title: Story Time
description: Tell me a funny or embarrassing story from your past.

title: Gourmet Chef
description: Make me a fancy sandwich with whatever ingredients you have.

title: Wild Card
description: This can be ANY challenge from the list, or a brand-new one of my choice!
